_sText:
**Updated to v2_1**
- Jump blocks now break, so no camping

(they were ment to break in the first place but pc crashed to bsod and i forgot to add it back in :s. sorry everyone)

**Updated to v2**

boatescape101 is a remake of boatescape6 by AuroraF

Changes:
- Spawn running section now longer less change of fail round
- New jumping section like in the original (not as hard however cant be camped)
- Boats leave faster
- Cage not breaking Fixed
- Added more cube maps
- Added health to wood blocking to the heli pad
- Changed helicopter and made it bigger
- Added a few more models at the end areas
- Tram rail now breaks when zombies are detected in tram or when afk tele 2 is activated. (stops people from getting telepoted into cage by accident
- Fixed a few surfaces that could be seen and had nodraw texture on them.
- Added more fun shootable props for CT
- Ladder to walk along tram rail now opens faster
- Changed a few textures



I made this for a mini challege for me (thegregster101) vs grandop. his boatescape themed map will be out "soon"  view more here http://forum.i3d.net/cs-source-work-progress/168989-grandop-vs-thegregster.html


- HDR
- 3D skybox
- Tram way
- 64 slots
- optimized
- cubemaps
- afk tele (no more hunting and also will make it alot harder)
